comment: This is a great hotel, quite and comfortable...the bar is a great place to hang out and Adam is a great bartender...the food here is exceptional...I have never had a bad meal here...so compliments to the chief...

everyoneShouldKnow: North side rooms have a great view of the capitol and campus.
title: Great central location
comment: The front desk staff were most pleasant to deal with. Sidenote: My experience with Grandbourne Properties shows them to be consistently outstanding at the front desk - and first impressions count. I didn't know if I had an BPG account as I've only stayed with these folks a few times, but the desk clerk found my account and moved me to the area reserved for Grandbourne folks - nice.

title: Great place to rest
comment: The Hotel was in a great location and very quiet. The room was very clean, comfortable, and spacious. The staff was great!

title: Great hotel
comment: Very nice hotel and staff

everyoneShouldKnow: Everyone is very polite and friendly..housekeeping could use some improvement in the room, and front desk is not up to expectations ..check in was not smooth and quick.
title: Nice hotel with a few exceptions
comment: Overall the room was clean..however there was a carton of spoiled milk in the ice bucket that Housekeeping must have missed after the last guest left..and the beds looked like someone had been sitting on them..not very well made up. I am still having issues with my room charges as this was an Online reserve w/ the AAA Hot Deal for two rooms At this point I am still being charged the full rate for both. I do hope they can resolve this issue. Appeared to be some confusion on check in as if they could not locate my reservations even though I had my printed confirmations in my hand from online???? Maybe gliches between reservation line and the hotel?

everyoneShouldKnow: Besure you dont need to use the restroom afer traveling because your potty may be broken.,
title: No Customer Service
comment: We checked in and the potty was running and the handle was broken. They did not want to give us a new room until the engineer(maintance man) was through. We stood int the hall for hour and half . Finally getting us a new room after we call the front desk THREE times.. They offered us a free breakfast but charge it on my account. They say customer service but they dont mean it.

everyoneShouldKnow: Street noise is the worst I've ever experienced.
title: Disappointed
comment: The noise from the freeway was terrible. My recommendation is avoid a room in the back if at all possible. I will likely be staying at another hotel next time I visit.

everyoneShouldKnow: This hotel refuses to honor BPG late checkout benefits.
title: Terrible experience
comment: This hotel refused to honor guaranteed 4PM checkout for BPG Elite members, kicking me out at 2PM stating that housekeeping needed to prepare the room for the next guest. Housekeeping kept banging on my door all morning from before noon even with DND sign on the door. Phone in the bedroom did not work. Except for check-in, all interactions w/hotel staff were unfriendly. Do not recommend this hotel.

title: very disapponting stay
comment: When I entered in my guestroom at first, I was really shocked because there was used toilet paper in the toilet without a flushing. Also, there was several strains on the mattress cover. I tried to contact the concierge to complaint this matters, they seemed to be busy serving guests in heavy rain, so didn't answer. It was a horrible stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: The team, they are very focussed on making your stay great!
title: Belvoir Universal Hotel review
comment: This is my third stay at Belvoir Universal.

title: needs house keeping
comment: We arrived to the hotel five minutes after check in time, our room was not ready. We were told they were ruining behind and our room would take about an hour. Came back an hour later, and our room was still not ready! I'm pregnant, had a long drive, and was very tired; eager to just REST. After another hour of waiting, I went to asked if our room was ready...and our room was not. Why? We've never had to wait soo long for any room. After all the waiting, we didn't even get the room we were suppose to get!

title: Great location!!!
comment: My family and I really enjoyed our stay at the Belvoir Princess! The staff was amazing! They all met all of our traveling needs from the time we checked in to the day that we left. The only complaint that I have about this hotel is that the swimming area for the kids is too small of an area. During the day and mid afternoon its filled with kids.

title: average overpriced hotel
comment: the location of the hotel is excellent, conveniently within 5 minute walk of multiple subway lines.

everyoneShouldKnow: Don't forget anything and use the safe.
title: Ideal location
comment: Since we always want to be near the water, staying at this Belvoir was ideal. The staff were most personable and very helpful whenever we needed guidance or a recommendation. The small size of the bathroom which could not accommodate a towel rack was a surprise but for only three days it was a minor bother. Unfortunately, we left a pair of shoes behind. When we called lost and found the next day, no shoes had been turned in. That was a real disappointment.

everyoneShouldKnow: three block walk to the beach
title: great location-short walk to the beach
comment: Ocean view was gorgeous, bed was very comfortable. This hotel is great for a short trip to Myrtle Beach. Does not have all the amenities of the ocean front properties, but they require a three night stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: very close to the boardwalk and very nice
title: this hotel was great
comment: close to the boardwalk, within walking distance, clean and well kept

title: Conference Stay
comment: We had a very pleasurable stay at the Belvoir Sand Key Resort. Our room was spacious and clean with a beautiful view of the Gulf. The staff were extremely nice and helpful. The only thing I would recommend would be to provide mini refrigerators and microwave ovens to patrons.

title: Extremely pleased
comment: The beds in this hotel make you feel like you are sleeping on a cloud. I haven't slept this well in years! The facility is spotless and the staff is friendly and very accommodating. I have already booked my next stay!

everyoneShouldKnow: Its people! They greeted us well and offered to assist in multiple ways.
title: Above and Beyond
comment: What set this hotel apart was its people. From the front desk to the ladies behind the cleaning carts, my wife and I felt welcomed. We especially want to mention Doris & Angelic & Glenford & Xavier as those who went above and beyond the expected, and made our stay so pleasant. We will book here again!

title: Great Family Vacation
comment: We were recommended to this hotel by BPG. The hotel was in an excellent location. It was convenient to all of the attractions in the city. The concierge was very knowledgeable and helpful recommending places to eat or visit. The hotel could use some updating, but the rooms were very clean.

everyoneShouldKnow: Three blocks off the beach, but the view from the 11th floor was good!
title: This hotel worked well.
comment: This hotel, for the money, was good. It is 3 blocks from the beach so you can get there if you want, but it is not right on the beach so you don't have the whole beach traffic issue. Also it is not far from Broadway at the Beach either. It gives you options.

title: Very old and dirty
comment: My room's rug smelled of dampness, was rumpled and had dirt on it. The toilet's water supply leaked.

title: BPG Guests
comment: I always enjoy staying at the Belvoir Pentagon City. I have been going there since it was the National.

title: The Staff is incredible
comment: I've never stayed in a motel where all of the staff members were present and asking if everything is good and if there is anything they can do for you. One of the printers in the business center was jammed. Chris the technician was there in 3 minutes and had my passport printed within 5. I loved the stay at this hotel.

title: very decent hotel
comment: If you want to stay close to Riverwalk, this hotel is the best option. It is two short blocks away from Riverwalk. The self-parking garage is one block from the hotel's parking lot. However, the breakfast for club members is very limited. There was no hot food besides the toast. The staff worked very hard and tried their best to meet our need. It's just not enough food for the club members on a Saturday morning at a short time frame.

everyoneShouldKnow: I felt safe. The facilities were well kept.
title: Hotel experience
comment: Peaceful and safe. High quality, reasonably priced. Conveniently close to downtown Tucson and the UA.

title: Wonderful stay
comment: The staff at the front of the hotel were welcoming and very nice. The room was kept very clean and the room attendants left a nice note for us everyday. Overall, the service, room, location were all excellent.

title: Good Facilties, Inconsistent Staff
comment: I spent 15 nights here throughout the month. The rooms were nice, and the pool area was a nice area to relax in. Fitness center was top notch. I found the staff to be inconsistent, at times blaming me for lapses on the hotels part (laundry services, green stay program, etc). Besides that, I would stay here again.

title: Cleanliness of hotel inconsistent
comment: Cleanliness of room great, however, cleanliness of common areas lacking. Mattresses are not up to the normal Belvoir standard of comfort. Paper thin walls makes for alot of noise between rooms. Overall, a little bit of a disappointment and I would think twice about returning here.

title: This hotel is dirty and dusty
comment: I stayed at the Belvoir because I wanted to be in Manhattan. Unfortunately, I made the wrong choice. The room was extremely small and exteremly dirty, furniture dusty and feathers were flying around the room. The staff rarely answer the phone so it was difficult to voice my opinion. My daughter got worst after the first day. What a dissapointment!

everyoneShouldKnow: club leve if available is great
title: granddaughter
comment: overnight in nyc with our 7 yr. old gd. I have 2 issues as a gold member. first to charge $3.25 per bag to hold our bags for 2 hours after checkout I feel is tacky. Second , which is not up to the hotel, is that it cost $94 for parking for 1 day plus 3 extra hours. try to negotiate a better rate with the garage if you can. we otherwise had a great experience .

everyoneShouldKnow: Cannot tell beforehand what to expect.
title: Lacks a swimming pool and whirlpool
comment: Extras and restrictions to club floors is iffy depending on location and staff at check-in. I can never tell what I will get beforehand. Anchorage definitely needs a pool and whirlpool open to all guests. As a BPG member, I do not see the advantages.

title: Great hotel
comment: Only complaint was that the room felt a little muggy/humid. Otherwise, a great value!

title: A very comfortable hotel
comment: The room was clean, bright, and cheery. The bead was wonderful and the staff was very professional.

title: Improvement
comment: Our room had, as requested, a handicap bathroom. However, the tub area did not have any entry handles on either side of the tub. The tub did have a handle on the back wall but this was not conducive to tub entry. Also, the shower head, which was a hand held shower head, did not have an anchor to maintain height or direction.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff will go out of their way to help with any request.
title: Incedible service!!
comment: From the minute we walked in we were treated like royalty. We had our two children with us and the staff was very attentive to them and made them feel great. We had one request that the lobby manager made happen. He was extrememly nice, and because of him, I would recommend this hotel to any and all. The food was GREAT too!!

title: Pleased with it all!
comment: Hotel met all our expectations. We truly enjoyed our stay and will return soon.

title: Updated hotel with a great location
comment: Pools are beautiful and updated!

title: Breakfast
comment: We thought Breakfast was included in the stay and found out it was $29.00.We weren't impressed!!!!

title: Excellent Hotel All Around
comment: This hotel receives my highest recommendation! The service is excellent - rooms superb and the beach is phenominal!

title: I had a great stay!
comment: Very nice hotel. Conveniently located. Lots to do in area. Good food, great staff, great rooms.

title: Excellent location
comment: We have been staying at this hotel for years and love the location as it is so convenient to everything. The service is great and the staff is wonderful. Dinah the front desk agent went above and beyond making our stay even better. I will recommend this hotel to friends and family. I hope to return again next year.

title: NYC Ironman Stay
comment: Came To Sheration NY for 8 days for the NYC Ironman with my family. Overall enjoyed the stay and renovations that made the hotel look clean. Location was excellent - close to Times Square and Central Park but not stuck in the middle of the chaos. Front desk service was excellent, and loved the food at the Hudson Grill - just wished they had the room service menu also available there at lunch not just dinner.

everyoneShouldKnow: The paid parking at the hotel also includes the day of departure meaning if you want to enjoy Universal Studios for a second day without additional charges you can.
title: Gateway to Universal Studios
comment: I have stayed at this hotel several times with my family and each time it has been a positive experience. The hotel is virtually minutes away by shuttle from City Walk and Universal Studios. This allows one to take a break during the day and to return to the excitment of the evening and the shows. A little bit dated but it is clean and nice, and has a staff that cares.

title: Grandbourne not
comment: We were dissapointed with this location. You are not acknowledged as a Grandbourne Gold, The fitness room was sparse and unkept as was the pool. The pool says it opens at 7am. On the the 4 days we there it was not open. The "hot tub spa" was not clean. The Bartender had to ask me 3 times whether I wanted lemon or lime..and he still did not get it right. The front desk people were fairly new. So if I did have a question it seems it had to be checked out with someone else. There were only two computers and every time I tried to use one there were kids playing games on them.

title: Noise and no refrigerator
comment: We stayed during the period when construction was going on. Even though we were warned, the noise was still unbeareable. We also asked for a refrigerator and they did't have one

everyoneShouldKnow: Don't plan on eating in the dining room for breakfast.
title: Vacation in San Francisco
comment: We stayed for 5 days at your hotel and it met all but two of our expectations. The first was we have become quite accustomed to having Wi-Fi provided as part of the room package and not have what I call a rather steep price charged as an extra fee. Second, your breakfast that was included with our AAA package was the worst I have encountered in many years of travel. If I had paid the 25 dollars that you were charging I would have been extremely upset.

title: First time in Denver
comment: This was our first time at Belvoir. I received an email that my reservation was cancelled, then I called and I had to make another reservation because someone had called and cancelled mine. I wonder what kind of information is verified to cancel a reservation, name, phone number? Bed was very comfortable, room kind of small, but ok. Bathroom was too small, only room for 1 person (barely). Not enough towels provided. Everything is extra. No refrigerator in the room, no microwave. I would not recommend it. Noise on our floor that woke me up around 3:00 am, I had a hard time falling back to sleep. For the price, I would go somewhere else that has a bigger bathroom, a microwave, refrigerator in the room, and breakfast. The only good thing is location. I was very disappointed.

title: Dissapointing
comment: We stayed in a King Suite and had several issues with the room. Many of the basics you'd expect (and are usually offered in BPG hotels) were missing, such as no drawers whatsoever, no pen or paper, no refrigerator, and no fan in the bathroom to remove steam from the shower. The toilet sounded like it was constantly filling and we had to call down about it. The vending machine on our floor ate our money, the one on the next floor was broken and the one two floors down that did work served us a warm bottle of water. There were also gnats in the bathroom, many of which were deceased and stuck to the ceiling because of the moisture that built up due to the lack of a fan. We ordered coffee, fruit and cereal for breakfast, which was fine. However, we were also brought butter, jam, syrup and ketchup on our tray, which was just weird. We did like the shuttle service and the pool was fine.

title: Great Anniversary Stay, But...
comment: This hotel is in a fabulous location and is very easy to get in and out of. We had a very relaxing and enjoyable first anniversary here.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location, very close to Navy Pier.
title: Rooms were clean and comfortable
comment: The beds were so comfortable, as expected by the Westin group. Check in was quick and we received a very nice upgrade and had a beautiful view of the lake.

everyoneShouldKnow: The adult-only infinity pool overlooking the ocean is the best feature.
title: Worth the vist
comment: Pros: The location is excellent. The adult only infinity pool overlooking the ocean is amazing. Brittany and Fillipo (beach service) were excellent. The Edge food was very good. Concierge was very helpful. Cons: I found roaches at the pool and the coffee shop. I was almost hit by a flying pool umbrella. The cost of renting beach chairs is very high.

everyoneShouldKnow: Has it all in one place and the best location for travelers or Vacationers
title: The Best Hotel In PUERTO RICO
comment: George , The Front desk Manager, and the staff are amazing.I love this place. Very professional , clean ,fun, very posh and the Best staff ever. The Management is doing their job to the fullest. I am very happy. do not change anything.

title: Only drawback
comment: An unexpected parking charge. Everything else was excellant.

title: Service and Location
comment: I am a local but stayed here for an event on a weekend...I was surprised...I knew it had a great location...but the staff was beyond typical Indy hospitality...great BPG recognition to a junior suite...location is fabulous...if you are visiting Indy you cannot go wrong with this property

everyoneShouldKnow: great location and views of NYC skyline
title: Great location and views of New York skyline
comment: This property is a great alternative to staying in NYC...ferry right outside the door brings you to NYC...great views of the skyline in a remodeled hotel...good indoor pool...only downside is price of parking

title: Nice property with great location
comment: This is a nice new property in a great Soho/Tribeca location...restaurants nearby...decent parking across the street at a decent price...nice coffee bar in lobby...very nice and un-New York staff....good platinum upgrade to suite...good price too...overall a property to use in NYC

title: Fantastic Girlfriend Getaway!
comment: I just returned from a great weekend at the Belvoir at Station Square. The staff including the managers, restaurant, shuttle drivers and housekeeping could not have been more accommodating. The rooms are very comfortable with an excellent view of the Pittsburgh skyline as well as the river. I hope that anyone who is planning a getaway weekend in Pittsburgh chooses the Belvoir at Station Square. You will not be sorry!

everyoneShouldKnow: The bed was clean and comfortable.
title: Met my expectations
comment: We were elated to actually stay in a hotel where the hotel photos matched the facility. Our suite was welcoming and clean. The kids had a wonderful time.

title: Had a good stay
comment: All was good with this hotel

title: Bathroom improvement
comment: 1. The shower drain is blocked by tons of hairs. I need to clean them before shower. (It was discovered on my 1st day arriving). It seems there's no constantly checking on the facility cleaniness.

title: awesome location
comment: offers shuttle to many sights, great pool, fabulous view

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is very friendly and accommodating.
title: This hotel has great features.
comment: My college friends and I recently spent a weekend at the Belvoir Station Square. Our two room spacious suite overlooked the Monongahela River and the spectacular skyline of Pittsburgh. The staff went above and beyond to accommodate us. The courteous shuttle drivers took us wherever we wanted to go in the area. We had a delicious dinner and breakfast buffet at the hotel. We will definitely be back!

title: The kids loved the pool
comment: This hotel had a very friendly staff. The best feature was the pool. The kids loved the pool.It is both inside and out, which you can have the best of both worlds. I wouldn't recommend the hot tub. You would expect a hot tub to be hot. Not the case here. The water was more on the luke warm side. Kind of disappointing, but with that being the only complaint. I would stay here again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Nice location next to the convention center and nice restaurants.
title: Small bathrooms
comment: The bathrooms were very tiny. The door to the bathroom was narrow and the threshold up into the bathroom is a trip hazard. There are no refrigerators in the room which was disappointing. Otherwise, the beds were comfortable.

title: Room in poor condition
comment: Rugs were dirty and stained. Left sunglasses in room called when I got home talked to housekeeping said they would call back with update Have heard nothing. very poor customer service

title: Disneyworld ticket scam!
comment: Our hotel room was clean and had a comfortable bed. Unfortunately the window air conditioner unit was very noisy when it was on, and it did not have the option to direct the vents in a certain direction.

everyoneShouldKnow: service was far less than expected
title: room with a view
comment: 1st arrived at the hotel and was not greeted as a Grandbourne Member

title: San Diego Downtown
comment: Excellent location downtown, clean, spacious suites with very unique parking structure..park on the 11th floor..lobby on the 12th floor.. most unique Belvoir I've stayed with...but very comfortable, clean and great customer service..along with a dynamite downtown location!

title: Great location
comment: My partner and I stayed at the Hotel in mid-August. The hotel in excellently situated within walking distance of Waikiki beach, good shopping centres and public/tourist transport.

everyoneShouldKnow: The service is robotic and no one seems to really care about the customer.
title: Just EH
comment: The staff was very "this is the answer I have been trained to give". Not what I expect from a BPG hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very respectful, helpful people working there.
title: This hotel is 5 star!!
comment: Everything about this hotel was awesome, and couldn't ask for better..

title: one night stay
comment: While I really only slept at the hotel while traveling over1400 miles, the hotel exceeded my expectations particularly because it only cost 3000 points. I was concerned that the hotel was going to be pretty bad. To my surprise it was excellent. I would stay again for a longer stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: Danus at the front desk was great!
title: Stay every year. Best stay ever!
comment: Danus, front desk, great!

title: Great Hotel and Staff
comment: First time ever staying at this hotel and would recommend it highly. Staff was great, but Joe who works both the bar and as the in-room dining host did an outstanding job. Joe was warm, friendly, and personable. He was very engaging while my fianc頡nd I shared a few drinks at the bar as we discussed Bears football. Also, he was very accomodating when my fianc頤id not like her wine choice, and quickly fixed the situation well above our expectations. Lastly, we called for food about 5 mins before the deadline for in room dining and he was there within 15 mins! Overall, the hotel was very clean, pool and facilities were awesome, and I would recommend this hotel for their people and location.

everyoneShouldKnow: Friendly staff who know how to treat their customers and a great hotel.
title: Great Atmosphere
comment: I have stayed at many hotels but non with the ambience that the Belvoir Gunter in San Antonio has. I don't know if it's the historic building or it's employees or both. Whatever it is, it's the best hotel and my entire family's favorite hotel. The moment you walk in, you feel relaxed at at ease.

title: Staff was fantastic
comment: Staff went out of their way to accomidate the people at our convention, esp the bellmen and conciere.

title: Convenient Location
comment: Hotel is conveniently located just off the highway and near the University. You are away from the busy downtown, yet close by. The room was clean, as was the entire facility. The room temperature was too hot for our comfort. Don't forget anything you might need, as the hotel does not have much available-you will need to go into Town.

title: Sadly
comment: I make a reservation for me and my family and they took It off, because of this situation I was not going to stay with You, but You still charge me for the hours I staid in the room, even when It was your mistake and I has to search for another hotel at 10pm with the rest of my family.

title: Wonderful experience
comment: The staff was pleasant, efficient and very helpful in making our weekend in Bricktown a memorable experience. The Club Room host was the most attentive I've ever encountered. The club room was very clean, the food delicious and drinks were available.

title: Convenient Convention Hotel
comment: The convenience of location and the accommodations for the convention attended at the hotel were wonderful. Staff was very friendly. There were two disappointments. First, my friend and I were given a king size bed when we requested, and had verifcation for, two beds in the same room. Second, the room was never cleaned unless we phoned the front desk and requested housekeeping.

title: The Staff
comment: I attended a group weekend (The Parrothead Club) and the staff was just amazing in how they treated us.

title: A fantastic stay
comment: What can I say? I stayed here for three nights to attend a National Sweepstakes Convention and never expected the level of service I received. The most impressive part of my stay - other than exceptional service all the way around - is how much the entire staff embraced the spirit of the convention. There were a large number of prizes given away by the hotel itself, including many vouchers for free nights that could be used toward our current stay. Each and every staff member I encountered went above and beyond to make us feel welcome.

title: Wonderful Staff...
comment: This hotel has a wonderful staff that really know the meaning of customer service.

title: The staff really was top notch
comment: Kudos to the staff. They were consistently prompt, courteous and helpful. Every single time we requested anything, it was there in minutes. Well done.

title: Awesome Stay
comment: I was in town to celebrate my b'day and the hotel staff went above and beyond their job duties to make this a fabulous stay!

everyoneShouldKnow: Expect to walk a good brisk walk with luggage to the hotel........Wi-Fi NOT complimentary.
title: No where near my expectations.
comment: As an executive of a large company Hotels are part of my life. This was definately a part i will choose to forget. First thing was lack of urgency from the staff, second charge of $8.00 a day to park my car a half a mile away to walk to the hotel ? Next after paying close to $200.00 for a weekend night I was charged for Wi-Fi ? Last and certainly not least was the wonderful dog barking most of the night and majority of the morning.

title: Waterfront hotel near Town Point Park
comment: Located on the Elizabeth River we enjoyed watching boats go by from our harbor view room. Clean, comfortable room. Nice linens, pillows.

title: Food
comment: It was very unfortunate but the the food was horrible. Conference meals, reception meals and breakfast were horrible.

title: More than we expected
comment: We stay in BPG hotels about 75% of each year. We selected this due to its proximity to the University. Pleasantly surprised at the amenities and the staff was very courteous and helpful. Recommend the club floor too.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great place to stay if you have business or pleasure in New York. Some great restaurants in Hoboken.
title: Limo Service
comment: The limo service recomended by the hotel was totally unprofessional with the driver unwilling to drop us off in front of the Penn station considering we had a handicap person with us.

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellent restaurants with great night life at Katie Mullins
title: Downtown Denver perfection
comment: Downtown Denver is beautiful and the downtown Denver Belvoir fits seamlessly into the beauty - The lobby is perfect, not overstated but elegant - The beds are heavenly - The staff and management exude competence and make the stay so pleasant

title: Ok for the price
comment: We paid low 100s for two weekend nights which was a good deal for that location (right on the 16th street mall). However, there were two main issues: 1) BOTH nights we were there, the alarm went off at least once. The alarm goes off and they have an automated voice blaring over speaker in your room for a really long time. This happened at midnight and 2am on the first night and 1am on the second night. To add insult to injury, after the alarm was "resolved" , the automated voice blares for another several minutes about how the alarm has been resolved. Just turn it off and be done with it next time!

title: Favorite Chicago Hotel
comment: Staff and friendliness always over the top! The venue is conveniently located to our desires. Paula, the concierge, knowledgeable, professional, welcoming, wow. Hotel is clean and public spaces roomy. The beds are great !

title: family friendly
comment: great location & very gracious staff...

title: Great Location and Services
comment: Hotel is at great location and close to all Disney Parks. Free Bus and Boat services to Parks and Downton Disney. Restaurant and Service are above our expectations. If you are visiting Disney or Orlando, this must be your Hotel to stay!!

title: Great outside appearance and large rooms
comment: Great First Impression, Nice and large rooms and helping staff.

title: Anniversary Trip
comment: This hotel was the perfect spot to spend an anniversary weekend! The location can't be beat and all the staff were so helpful and friendly. Will definitely be staying at this hotel again.

title: Great hotel, great location
comment: Overall very satisfied with this hotel. It is very clean, comfortable with good amenities at a reasonable price. Also a great downtown location. It is a very busy hotel, there were several meetings and weddings going on the weekend I was there but inside my room I was never disturbed. The gym/pool area is great with a wonderful deck for relaxing or sunning that overlooks the river. A couple cons - pay for internet, I really don't think hotels of this caliber should charge; elevators were a bit slow.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is walking distance to alot of attractions downtown.
title: convention weekend
comment: I really enjoyed my stay at the Gunter last weekend, even though the first night our ac went out in the room we were at the staff made it up quickly with moving our room, upgrading our internet and access to club area. We received the best service from the bellmen.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very updated, entire staff was friendly and helpful
title: Has to be the best in Atlanta
comment: The most attentive hotel staff that I've ever witnessed. Each and every person from the manager to the deli clerks were amazing!

title: Great hotel.
comment: Clean, comfortable rooms and a courteous and professional staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great Location. Great Staff. Pet Friendly.
title: Great Hotel / Great Staff.
comment: We took our two small kids and our small dog to the hotel for a getaway weekend. Couldn't have been more pleased with the room and the staff. Very Clean, Pet Friendly, in expensive. Great Pool and gym. Great areas to walk the dog. Very close to Norwalk aquarium and children's museum and the downtown area of stamford is really great. Awesome break from NYC life without the major cost.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location next to Six Flags and Cowboy stadium.
title: Romantic Getaway
comment: I want to thank the hotel staff and the service personnel for a great weekend. The Belvoir never lets me down. I will always search for a Belvoir when ever I travel. Thanks again.

title: Very Comfortable
comment: Great location with clean comfortable rooms. The staff is fantastic! Great front desk, very helpful. Mike in the Club level was awesome! A real pleasure to find a gem hotel like this.

title: This hotel front desk staffs were not friendly
comment: Staffs were not very welcoming when I checked-in. They did not describe hotel directories and any hotel features. When I got to a room, there was no hotel directory book. I just stayed for one night, but I feel that overall expectation wouldn't be improving even if I stay there for more than one night.

everyoneShouldKnow: The service is first-rate as well as the staff. They were friendly.
title: service
comment: from the moment i entered the hotel, the staff was friendly and the environment was great. The hotel was easy to locate, right off the highway. The cleanliness of the hotel was impressive and the snacks in the lobby was something that was needed. The indoor heated pool was welcomed by our family.

title: super comfy rooms nice staff
comment: hotel staff was very accommodating and nice. beds totally comfy.

everyoneShouldKnow: It smells a bit like mildew
title: Great Time
comment: We stayed at the Belvoir for a concert/festival in August 2012. We had a wonderful time, and the staff was very helpful. The bartender, Mike, was a great addition to our evenings - he made jokes with us and we all had a great time.

title: Son's Wedding Night
comment: Staff did not provide bottle of Champaign as requested, did not explain breakfast arrangement was paid for, etc. Overall, a diaster. Also, somehow reservations were intended to be for 1 day, not 2 days as setup. May have been a misunderstanding on my side, not sure.

title: Great hotel
comment: We had been booked at another area hotel but changed our booking to the Belvoir because we were traveling with a dog and the hotel is dog friendly. We enjoyed the hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Always willing to take care of what needs to be taken care of
title: Hotel is very accomidating
comment: I have to say that I am very impressed with the staff at this hotel (for the most part). My only issue was one of the waiters in the lounge. There was a group of 4 of us having drinks in the lounge one night and we had to wait quite awhile for him to come back over to see if we wanted another round or anything else for that matter. I could understand this if it was busy but there was only 2 people sitting at the bar and another table of 2 as well. Other than that everyone else was very helpful.

title: THE BEST
comment: Great service

title: Was Wonderful!!
comment: I had a great stay, the room was Really Clean, Nice and Most Comfortable Bed! The views were great. I stayed on the 9th floor in the preferred level and was quite happy with my weekend stay. I would definately stay there again in a heartbeat.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location that is very convenient to shopping!
title: Great Family Stay
comment: My husband, youngest son and I spent the last weekend of summer in Atlanta. The staff was friendly. The hotel is in a great location. We were upgraded to the presidential suite. Fantastic stay. Quiet room. Good security.

title: Not what I expected
comment: My reservation was not honored. I reserved and ocean front room and was almost put in an ocean view room. The staff lost my car keys and it took them over an hour to find them. The staff did apologized for the misplacing my car keys. the suite was not very clean. The hotel is nice and the location is great.

title: Outstanding Service and Personnel
comment: This was my fourth stay at the Belvoir and I have never been disappointed. From the moment I arrive the service is always impeccable. It starts at the door when I am greeted by the bellsman and it continues with the rest of the hotel staff. Rooms are always clean and hotel staff are always very accomodating. I always recommend this hotel to friends or co-workers traveling to the Dalls area. The restaurant is very clean and the food is absolutely delicious!!!!

title: Just What I was Looking For
comment: Your hotel met my needs as far as location and price, but more than that, I wanted something more than just a basic hotel room and you certainly exceeded my expectations there.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff was very helpful and pleasant. Seemed concerned and called by name.
title: convenient to Baylor
comment: Staff was great. Location was easy to reach from Baylor Medical Center.

everyoneShouldKnow: Best hotel to stay at when taking daugther or son to University of Iowa.
title: Subtle Changes at Hotel
comment: No longer slip check-out stmt under door night before check-out. Have to ask for a copy to review charges. Housekeeping only replenishes Shampoo & Conditioner not bars of soap, shower gel or Qtip/Cotton balls. No longer provide small loufah for shower. Choices in Club Level have decreased as well as quantity. Rooms are still wonderful, comfortable and well cleaned. Will always go back when in town and available. Still love the hotel.

title: Convenience
comment: I have stayed here several times because of the proximity to PDX and the convenience, especially when I have an early morning flight. Shuttle is always available on the outgoing and return. Also, the proximity to Ikea and other shopping areas is great as well!

title: Unexpected Wake-Up Call
comment: After flying 4 hours to get to Denver and running directly to a client dinner, I finally made it back to the property around mid-night before getting up at 5:30a to continue my journey to Vail. Unfortunately, the fire alarm went off for 25-solid minutes at 2a. After 25 minutes, there was about 2 minutes of silences which was followed by another 2 minutes of annoucements (all repeative) letting us know that we were all-clear. When I went to check out that morning, the front desk did not apologize or acknowledge it at all.

title: This hotel has great features
comment: The hotel was conveniently located to Met Life Stadium, and the hotel provided excellent transportation to the game at a reasonable cost. The staff was very courteous and professional.

title: Great Service!
comment: We chose the Belvoir because my daughter was running the America's Finest City half-marathon. The hotel was offering a special pasta dinner the night before the race. She has a gluten intolerance and the restaurant manager was only too happy to cook up the gluten-free pasta we brought with us. They were absolutely delightful about the special request. It was a treat for her and very much appreciated! Thanks so much!

title: Friendly and great time for my kids
comment: The staff was very friendly with the kids and

everyoneShouldKnow: Beautiful setting right on the marina
title: The Best Hotel in San Diego
comment: A very pleasant stay close to the major tourist attractions. Staff very competent and friendly..

title: Great Hotel visit
comment: THe hotel exceeded out expectations in every way. THe place was clean, the people were very friendly & helpful and always smiling. The room was clean and comfortable. I hope to return very soon.

everyoneShouldKnow: This is a gem on the Ohio with great views of Louisville.
title: What a great place to stay.
comment: This hotel is great. I loved the modern furniture and cool lobby. Everyone was gracious and the shuttle driver was exceptional. We were here for a wedding and will stay here again if traveling through.

everyoneShouldKnow: this facility does not honor BPG Gold members for access to club lounge.....what's up with that
title: This hotel has some good features
comment: The pool had not been cleaned yet (full of hair....gross) but jacuzzi was great and I was disappointed when told that this facility does not honor BPG Gold members for access to club lounge.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great hotel in a great location
title: we always stay at this hotel when we're in chicago.
comment: We have always stayed at the Belvoir Northbrook when we visit Chicago. It is always clean and the associates are wonderful. The rates are comparable. It is convenient to shopping and restaurants. There is no reason to stay anywhere else when in Chicago.

title: Dissapointing
comment: Pool not usable , Room never made up during the day , Parking lot full forced to park in public lot at my expense but , stil had to pay for Hotel parking . Did not come anywhere near my expectations for the Hotel. Would not recommend this to anyone. Very dissapointing .

title: Extremely Friendly
comment: Everyone at the hotel was extremely friendly. From the people at the front desk to the maintainers. All hotel staff had a contagious smile on their face and always acknowledged our presence. My friend and I couldn't get over how genuine everyone was!

title: If only...
comment: Our stay would have been flawless except - We reserved a "Deluxe King" room for a view. Upon check-in we were advised there were no Deluxe King rooms available (We made our reservation well in advance.). The girl at the desk was very kind and when I voiced my concern about my reservation for a room with a view she advised me that wing was closed. She did give us a $50 room credit for the inconvenience.

title: Beautiful hotel
comment: Generally everything exceeded my expectations except that the front desk had difficulty coding our room keys to allow for the unlimited parking access which we paid for. I had to have the keys redone 4 times and it was quite frustrating to have to wait in the line each time at the front desk to do so.

title: Belvoir Louisville, IN
comment: Excellent accommodations.

title: Excellent
comment: We enjoyed our stay at the Belvoir while we were visiting UPENN. Location is great, rooms are clean and big, staff is very friendly. $25 parking which is not bad. They offer free internet which was agreat addition. We recommend this hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: it's a great location and rooms are comfy.
title: Had a good time
comment: Me and my girlfriends had a wonderful time in NYC and this hotels location is amazing. Staff was great when checking in and security guards at elevators were friendly. Only thing that was a minus for us was the linens didn't smell to attractive. It wasn't just one towel it was all our towels and bedsheets. I'm not sure if it's the detergent or maybe the water but it's definitely something that needs to be changed.

title: awesome
comment: we had the best time at the Belvoir...staff and stay was the best i ever experienced....there were 13 of us and we all have only good things to say... we were treated like vip's for sure

title: Mr.
comment: Wonderful, the room was spotless, buffet delicious and staff courtious. Thank You!!!

title: Great hotel
comment: The only thing that was wrong with the stay was that the faucet didn't work right and you had to use two hands to turn it on. Everything else was great. Love the beds

title: Theh otel had a luxurious rooms!
comment: The staff was professional and attentive. The hotel was clean and the rooms were very comfortable. It is convenient to the airport and downtown.

title: The hotel rooms offer comfort.
comment: enjoy Chicago here at the Belvoir Hotel

title: Great check in
comment: Alexandra, at check in,was exceptionally professional and courteous. My stay was my first as a platinum status Srarwood guest and I was thankful for her genuine warmth and attention.

title: Poor check in experience
comment: I've never had such a poor check in experience. As a Platinum member I've had easy experiences getting checked in quickly and with a high level of service. When I arrived at the hotel on Saturday at 8pm, the lobby was filled with guests waiting to check in. There were no front desk agents at the BPG preferred check in desk for at least 5 minutes. There were only a few agents working the regular check in line. And the service was extremely slow. There weren't any managers walking around the lobby to apologize to the guests for the delay or offer them water while they wait. Nothing. People had to ask the managers walking around what is going on and if they could get more front desk agents to help.

title: Staff was very courteous
comment: Answered any questions we had very honest and with a smile.

title: just right
comment: Hotel was booked through Expedia and was a great value for the price. Yes, the hotel is a little aged but is more than adequate if you are going to do more than stay in the room all day. Location was central to all popular areas and near mass transportation. Valet/bellman were excellent as well as the front desk staff. Bed was really comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: far east side of Tampa - near Brandon.
title: Great Hotel for the eastside of Tampa
comment: i have stayed at every hotel in tampa bay - and this is a very nice addition. although a little out of the way for my normal activites, i would definitely stay here again. what sets this hotel apart is the staff - they were terrific. i cannot recommend enough if you have a need to be on that side of town...

title: Wonderful Staff
comment: The staff at this hotel was excellent. They were so friendly and welcoming. Even when I passed a housekeeper in the hallway she smiled and greeted me with a friendly "hello." Our room was beautiful with a great view of downtown Denver. The room was clean and the beds/pillows were very soft and comfortable. This hotel meet all of my needs and I would stay again if I'm in the area.

title: Great hotel!
comment: Hotel was very clean and comfortable! Our check in was a little bumpy due to no rooms being clean so we were upgraded to a nicer room room with an awesome view. We had the best time ever and could not have asked for a better hotel!

title: Comfort and Cleanliness!
comment: Our room was on the club level, and we were very pleased with it. We LOVED the fact that the pool was open 24 hours! I had never seen that anywhere else.

title: Great experience
comment: Everyone that works at this hotel is incredibly friendly and helpful. Especially Matt at the front desk, who went out of his way to assist me and make me feel at home.

title: Great Customer Service
comment: We had a wonderful weekend in Washington DC. The customer service staff at the Belvoir Pentagon City Hotel was excellent. Our room was not ready when we arrived as expected. So, the front desk gave us vouchers for a free drink or appetizer in the lounge while we waited. The breakfast bar was amazing.

title: Great Service and location
comment: Superb location where the staff could not do more. Randy even hosted a 'welcome event' for BPG members where the senior staff were available to talk to the guests. Front of house could not do more for us and I would like to specifically callout the staff in the Club room (Ryan and Jose) who made special provision for my wife's food allergy - really appreciated. One of only a few hotels where I have felt compelled to issue my BPG 'thank you' cards. Only downside would be the pool which was a little on the small side for us - but it was available and pool bar staff were very attentive.

everyoneShouldKnow: You need a gps to get there.
title: Very Nice
comment: I was there attending a conference.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is a very pretty property and ask for a room with a patio because they are available.
title: Great stay in LaJolla
comment: This is a great Belvoir! The hotel is clean, the grounds are beautiful, it is close to UCSD, shopping, Trader Joes, Sprinkle Cupcakes, (all walking distance), the I-5 which makes it easy to get around San Diego. It is 10 minutes to the Aquarium and to the beach (not walking distance) but it is clean, great bar, great and helpful Bellman (Michael) he knows all the helpful hints and it is a quiet but kid friendly hotel. A true hidden treasure that I am glad we found and weill definitely return!

title: great stay
comment: I have stayed in many Belvoir hotels in the past and as always this one was great. From the minute we checked in to getting walking directions to our restaurant. The staff was wonderful and I asked for and got a great upgrade. The view from the room was the best right across from the Harbor. The room was neat and clean. I would recommend this hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Shuttle service, transportation desk are really good and prompt service. Parking facility is really good with ample space.
title: Tranportation Service
comment: Belvoir Medowlands have prompt shuttle service with a tranportation desk on call any time which is really useful to all who are new to NJ or NY.

everyoneShouldKnow: Pay for the nicest room you can afford, it will be worth it to avoid ground level.
title: Disappointed
comment: I did not receive the room I was told I was booking. I didn't have time to go back to the reservation desk as I was attending a wedding an hour from the time I checked in, and was hoping to have someone come to my room to help me avoid that walk back and forth so that I could be moved to the room I expected to get, no offer of that whatsoever though. There were dirty dishes outside our room when we checked in, it was ground floor with a horrible view-which I called specifically to AVOID. I requested a balcony marina view room on a lower level and got a view of a tennis court fence w/ no privacy. The location of the hotel is great, there is a lot to do around there especially for tourists. Thats about where my satisfaction ends.

title: This hotel has great decor'
comment: The colors and patterns used blend well with the structure and design. Veryh inviting and relaxing!

title: Belvoir New York is Fantastic
comment: We spent five nights in your hotel and enjoyed everyone of them. The room location was great, club floor breakfast was filling, maid service was very professional, and the staff answered all our questions professionally.

title: Room
comment: Did not expect a Belvoir Room could be so Dim and the bathroom, very disappointed.

title: extremely clean
comment: This was the cleanest hotel room I have been in. The staff exceeded expectations and it could not have been a better pick for our weekend. Absolutely beautiful hotel.

title: Under Construction... staff made our stay more pleasant
comment: Although we had several inconveniences, we first arrived and there was no electricity, construction was taking part in the parking lot and our ac's, in both rooms were very poor; nevertheless the staff made it all better... great staff! Thanks!

title: Renovation needed
comment: The club floor room i was given clearly is in need of a facelift; the screens on the windows are either missing or bent out. Upon arriving at the room at around 5PM, there was a large bag of garbage outside my room from the days cleanings apparently. When entering the room it appeared as though the room was cleaned yet not put back together; drawers not pushed in, table pushed to the side, etc. I was looking for local information and called the front desk, the phone rang no less then 20 times, NO Answer. I called back on the guest services line, the phone rang 4 times, was picked up and hung up. I walked down to the front desk and asked where the guest services line would be ringing to, and the asst. manager said here. The tall guy working behind the desk looked over, said he was busy at the time i called; so, one does not answer the phone, or picks up the phone and hangs up. I am not sure why the hotel appears to be run down with the business that it does at that location; i would hope that changes are slated for the near term.

title: Call I will tell you
comment: The bathroom was not clean. The bed was uncomfortable and left my back and my husband back sore and tried .I went to the front desk to ask for someone to remove a previous guest belonging and no one came I had to take pictures and go to front desk again then housekeeping came to my room .They took the dirty towels and left my room.I checked behind them and still left some ones underwear int the shower .I had to call down the hallway to have them come back . I like the hotel but it was not a good experience. you

title: Consistently Excellent
comment: never disappointed at the Belvoir West Des Moines

everyoneShouldKnow: Friendliest and most helpful staff of any hotel we have ever stayed at.
title: Lovely stay
comment: We enjoyed ourselves very much. As usual the staff was great. We used the gym and pool and it was very nice. The only thing was the water pressure in the shower was kind of pitiful. Other than that it was great and we enjoyed our stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great hotel great customer service!!! Fabulous views.
title: Hotel and Staff were exceptional
comment: The rooms were great and the staff was very pleasant. This made my first trip to Chicago an exceptional one. One particular employee who was exceptional was a waitress named Diane in the bar area, never met anyone nicer or more pleasant!!! She is a great asset to the hotel and made a super long day enjoyable!!!!!

everyoneShouldKnow: Whatch for goose drpings lol,,very very quiet! Elevators smooth all the way to the 19th floor
title: General
comment: Exelent rooms,food and personnel

title: Noise
comment: We spent the night hearing the people next door having a never ending fight!!!!

title: Club Floor was a disappointing extra cost.
comment: The extra cost for the Club Floor was not worth it. The person we checked in with suggested we wait in the Club Room until our room was ready. We asked the attendant for coffee and she said she was busy cleaning. When we went for the hors d'oeuvres there were no clean plates, food on the floor and serving area and the hot food inedible. Both attendants handed out the card with suggested tip. NOT! The room itself was beautiful with a wonderful view and the lobby was very nice. Loved the hotel in general.

title: Great venue hotel
comment: We were the Parrotheads there for the weekend, and it was wonderful. Can't wait to come back again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Loved the comfortable beds and clean rooms
title: PARROT HEAD 3 DAY GATHERING
comment: We had an event at the hotel for over 200 people. The rooms were very clean, beds comfortable, lots of bathroom amenities, and the staff in both the hotel and the event staff (food and beverage) were fun and accommodating. Every hotel staff member we encountered went out of their way to make it a pleasant stay. My first time at this hotel and it wont be my last.

title: Nearly perfect experience
comment: The room was large, very comfortable and attractive.

title: Great hotel in a convenient location!
comment: I stayed here for a girl's weekend away and it fit the bill. Convenient walk to Millenium Park for free outdoor concerns, a few block walk to Navy Pier for evening fun and theater and a block to phenomenal Michigan Avenue for great shopping. Check-in was fast and friendly, we had a great view of the river and city in a very comfortable room. Fitness facilities were quite good with a nice view of the river while I worked out each morning!

everyoneShouldKnow: Good bar, good bed, questionable service and accommodations.
title: Disappointing for a Belvoir
comment: I was on a business trip and needed to stay over an extra night in a different city. My travel office booked the Belvoir for me, which I was looking forward to, based on my past stays within this brand. The staff at the check-in counter were not pleasant and lacked any type of enthusiasm, warmth or friendliness. I'm an BPG member and was not acknowledged in any way. Not that I wanted a red carpet rolled out for me, but if they had for instance said something along the lines of "I see here that you're an BPG member, and we've got a room here that we use for BPG members", it really could have gone a long way. Sometimes it's the little things. For me, this was a big thing...instead of being made to feel appreciated, I felt as if I was inconveniencing them to have to check me in.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is very friendly, helpful and go above and beyond to help the guests.
title: Excellent staff
comment: The staff went above and beyond with their service. It was very refreshing to receive smiles from all staff members every time and they were very helpful and pleasant. The location was not very good but once there, I enjoyed my stay. Thank you for taking your time to hire caring and polite staff, it makes a big difference.

title: Towels and Linens Smell Bad
comment: First time ever, staying anywhere, that I could not stand the smell of the towels or bed linens (smelt funky, nasty, musky). Staff informed us that there is a problem with the cleaning contractor. No excuse. Only refunded us a portion of BPG pts used. First time ever staying with BPG that i have not been satisfied. Would avoid this hotel until this problem is fixed

title: Upgraded room with no AC
comment: Paid for an upgraded room (park view). AC did not work in the room. Even the fan/blower wouldn't engage. Informed front desk upon checkout since we did not get into the room until late and were too tired to mess with it that evening. They were nice enough and apologized but did not commit to do anything about it.

everyoneShouldKnow: How friendly and helpful the stafrf is
title: Great hotel
comment: This is a great hotel and all the staff were

title: Bad experience
comment: A/C did NOT work. Hot in our room & it was cooler in the hallway. Couldn't move us due to being full. Gave a refund but no other hotel s available. No free breakfast offer or anything else to make us happy. Finally had to call down to front desk for a fan & I was told don't think they had one but would check. About 30 minutes later we got a fan. Next day, the elevators were ALL messed up. Skipping floors & limited amount of people in them. Complained but they didn't do anything. Finally had to go out emergency exit to get out of the building.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is Very Clean and usually have a wonderful stay. Friendly staff in the restaurant and bar.
title: Not as usual
comment: We are a regular guest and always stay in a Studio Suite with Club privileges on a high floor. We, always when booking, requested a high floor- they gave us a room with the cab drivers on the lowest floor #3!!! They finally agreed to move us on the second night to the 9th floor. We did appreciate that but the first night was wasted (although my husband enjoyed talking with cabbies from our balcony!!) The club floor was full of children and people taking piles of food and in some cases 10 bottles of water out of the room. (Fri night on Sat evening we went up for our usual bottle of wine to watch the sunset and enjoy- nope walked in and walked out.

title: Great Location
comment: Recently stayed here during a weekend family trip. The location is great. It is an easy walk to Navy Pier and Michigan Ave. The concierge was extremely helpful in directing us to great restaurants. We will definitely stay here on our next trip to Chicago!

everyoneShouldKnow: This hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.
title: In the heart of it all
comment: Very happy with the Belvoir New York. The staff was friendly and helpful, the rooms were very clean and the location is perfect if you're looking for staying in the action. Close to everything and the subway is nearby so it was perfect.

title: Belvoir Chicago
comment: The hotel lobby is nicely furnished and has a welcoming and luxury feel to it. The room also meet the standards of a 4-star hotel, with very comfortable beds and well-maintained interior and amenities. In general the service staff were friendly and helpful. However, I was disappointed by the general lack of attention to details. I have booked a double bed room and indicated there are 2 guests. When I arrived, there was only 1 bathrobe, 1 mouthwash and 1 glass mug in the room. I had to call for another bathrobe. When housekeeping cleaned the room the next day, the vanity pack and mouthwash were not replenished.

everyoneShouldKnow: The Staff is very friendly and curtious, willing to accommodate their guest.
title: The Best Hotel along the San Diego Bay
comment: This was my second stay at this fabulous hotel. I've recommended this Belvoir to all my co-workers to stay here when they visit San Diego. This is the only hotel I will use when I come to San Diego. It's close to downtown, it offers shuttle services to and from the airport. It also offers the Big Bay shuttle which services all the highlight areas along the bay area for an affordable price $1.00 for all day. This was one of the best ammenities besides the view.

title: Did not get the BPG preferred room
comment: BPG gold member and did not receive BPG preferred room

everyoneShouldKnow: The location is a huge advantage.
title: awesome location
comment: This hotel is in a great location to see all of the sights. Central Park and many other places are easily within walking distance. If a subway is needed, the station is right across the street. The room was very comfortable, and the multiple pillows were appreciated.

title: Hotel accomodations were great and reasonable
comment: Our recent stay at the Belvoir was great! The hotel and room was clean and updated. The staff was helpful and friendly. The breakfast consisted of fresh quality food and beverages and was included in the hotel rate.

everyoneShouldKnow: The hotel is amazing on all levels
title: This hotel is wonderful
comment: The hotel was amazing for travel. I got a suite at a great price and the ammenities were very nice. I loved having a balcony and the location was wonderful for dining and a BUCS game, which is what the trip was for. The staff was friendly and kept up with everything, including towels at the pool, which is indoor - great for rainy days in Florida, or anything I wanted in my room. I would definently stay at this hotel again... best experience I have had in a while, and we love to travel!

everyoneShouldKnow: The carpets everywhere in this hotel were filthy!
title: UGH!
comment: The carpets everywhere in this hotel were filthy!

title: Decent hotel close to DC
comment: The Belvoir Crystal City is a high turnover hotel, so I had low expectations. As a plat, I was upgraded to a Club Level room I dont think this hotel has suites. However, the Lounge is closed during the weekends. I was impressed by the room, which was clean, bright, and had modern looking furniture. My only complaint is that the desk has no electrical outlets nearby, and it was 4 feet to the nearest power strip.

title: Fabulous Chicago Visit
comment: Wonderful Staff, Great location and views. Highly recommend this Belvoir in Chicago. Will definetly stay here again.

title: Great getaway
comment: The only complaint we had for our 3 day stay was that the pool was closed on Sunday for cleaning and there was no seating available at the small pool. Room was very nice with great view from the balcony.

title: Great Hotel
comment: My family had a wonderful and relaxing stay at the Belvoir Suites.

everyoneShouldKnow: You are next to one of the world's finest beach!
title: Treated wonderfully!
comment: We had a wonderful time and visit at the

title: Nice Hotel
comment: The Carpet was a little soiled, but overall a decent room.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is a great value in an expensive area.
title: This hotel is a great value
comment: We spent 4 nights at the Belvoir Hotel and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. It is a great value. The hotel was clean and comfortable and has a very attentive staff.. It was a short walk to the beach and other local attractions.

title: Nice
comment: Very nice place to stay. this place is well kept.

title: Very comfortable and relaxing
comment: Love the beds and pillows after a long day out this sure makes for a good night sleep.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great Location and Staff. Very Clean
title: This hotel is Great!!!
comment: What a great experience. The Belvoir Lake Buena Vista was a perfect start and end to vacation. A very important feature when booking a room for me is its cleanliness. And it met all expectations. The staff was wonderful, the amenities were exactly what we were expecting and the activities were great for families. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Looking forward to the new banquet facilities! Can't wait to visit again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Pool is indoors so no sun...
title: Great Time in Ft Worth
comment: Great hotel with a great AAA rate package. Breakfast was awesome each day to start our day. Location is right next to water park and convention center so very close to everything.

title: The hotel food was excellent
comment: The hotel food was excellent and the service.

title: Nice appearance
comment: Room located directly in front of emergency exit; next to railroad tracks, could hear bumping and knocking noises through the wall all night from plumbing; trains ran throughout the night and kept me awake.

everyoneShouldKnow: This is a first class hotel
title: charles gillon
comment: Excellent hotel, accommodations. & facilities.

title: Slightly disappointed
comment: Our room was located on the first floor and the carpet was slightly damp. Our AC unit was either completely on or completely off, and therefore the room was either very cold or humid. We also found a beetle in our room and there was a couch that looked like it had seen better days, which made us slightly uncomfortable sitting on it. The lighting seemed dim as well.

title: this was a very nice hotel
comment: for me for the kind of hotel ,there very ship charge for a bottle of water internet way to expensive ,one of the person in my room used a bottle of water they almost call the police for it,because my credit card was not on file plus charge me 4 dollars for a bottle of water

everyoneShouldKnow: Very nice facilities; within walking distance of the All State Arena- good for concerts
title: Excellent guests ervice
comment: My friend and I stayed at the hotel for one night to go to a concert in the All State Arena.

everyoneShouldKnow: Right across the street from Majestic Theatre and short walk to the Riverwalk.
title: San Antonio Blues
comment: We were in town to see BB King. When we got to your hotel (we had switched from another hotel we were not happy with) we were directed to the Club Lounge for drinks and appies, and while there a member of your staff told us about the live blues band performing on the patio. We listened to the band for about two hours before the concert, which was unexpected and much appreciated. While there we met members of the San Antonio Blues Society and other blues musicians, and really got into the energy prior to the concert.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location (view) from the side facing the Pentagon easy access to the Metro view the shuttle bus.
title: Great Value
comment: We weren't sure what to expect but found our family vacation stay at the hotel a mostly positive experience. The pro's and con's are a mixed bag.

title: Great location
comment: This is a great location if you need to be by Stanford Univercity. With nice clean rooms and friendly staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: Lovely interior, great value, nice staff.
title: Huge room for NYC!
comment: This was a great room for our family of four. We spent only one night after dropping my daughter off at college so it was great not to have to book two rooms. The teenage kids thought it was nice also. Nice little bar for the parents to recover. All staff were very pleasanat and helpful. Not the prettiest location (Canal St.) , but convenient enough. The room had no view, but that's OK.

title: great location
comment: hotel is in very convenient location. it is very near to several of our favorite resturaunts and activities

everyoneShouldKnow: There is only one bathroom for use near the pool and it must be used by males and females. Since it has a shower in it, it can be tied up for long periods of time.
title: The hotel was great but the food was mediocre.
comment: The hotel was consistent with Belvoir's high standards but the food was mediocre at best.

title: great hotel
comment: Staff very friendly and helpful. I will be returning to this hotel

everyoneShouldKnow: If you have a problem, talk to a MANAGER...not a desk person.
title: Decent room but hair in bathroom
comment: The hotel is pretty decent as is the room (although a bit on the small side). Overall this is an average hotel.

title: Be careful...
comment: When making reservations be sure to ask for a room that does not have a (2nd) door that leads to the adjacent room. The sounds carries and it seems as if the people in the room next door are sitting on your bed talking, or in our case a crying child is in bed with you.

title: Great stay, convenient location
comment: My family of four really enjoyed our stay at the Sheratown Downtown hotel. The Parking, Bell and Front Desk staff were all excellent, our rooms was nicely sized for our family and the location was very convenient to in town and out of town activities. The only complaint was that Housekeeping (also generally excellent) cleaned the rooms of people not checking out very late, leading to a very frustrating experience when my family got back to rest in our room at 4pm, only to discover our room wasn't clean when we got there leading to our only frustration during our 4-day stay

everyoneShouldKnow: AN ATMOSPHERE OF RELAXATION AND STAFF HELPFULNESS
title: THIS HOTEL IS IDEAL FOR A DISNEY HOLIDAY
comment: LOVE THE FOYER WITH ITS FOUNTAIN,COOLNESS,LARGE HIGH OPEN SPACE AND RELAXING ATMOSPHERE.OUR CHILDREN ABSOLUTELY LOVED PEEK- A- BOOS WITH ITS RELAXING DECOR AND HAPPY STAFF. SERVICE, ESPECIALLY CLEANLINESS OF ROOMS AND STAFF POLITENESS EXCELLENT

title: Good Times at Virginia Beach Belvoir
comment: This hotel is a great place to stay in Virginia Beach with a prime location in the North End. Overall it is an excellent hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: It has a great exercise facility
title: Excellent workout facility
comment: Ammost like a mini-gym..up to date equipment with a nice pool as well.

everyoneShouldKnow: The beach is private to hotel guests and not nearly as crowded as the Clearwater public beaches.
title: Wonderful Experience
comment: This was our second trip to the Belvoir Sand Key Resort and for the second time our stay was great! The hotel staff from front desk to housekeeping to maintenance to restaurant was kind, courteous, and welcoming. While the rooms did not have refrigerators, we rented one for a nominal daily fee. We were provided a Platinum BPG member upgrade to a wonderful room with view of the pool area and Gulf beach. My wife's 50th birthday was even acknowledged upon our arrival. The only drawback was that the water was murkier with lots of seaweed, and it was extremely windy this time around, but this was due to the mother nature and nothing related to the hotel's excellent service. We will return, hopefully annually!

everyoneShouldKnow: Beautiful Hotel with great feel, you won't want to leave.
title: Great Weekend!!!
comment: This was my second stay. I love this place and will be back again next month. It has a very peaceful and calming energy to it. All of the staff is very accommodating. I really enjoy the beauty of this place and wish to return monthly for a nice getaway from the city.

title: Hotel ambience is there
comment: All OK, except the parking...not only do you pay, you also have a tough time to get one or in & out is a pain.

everyoneShouldKnow: Seems like they just revamped for the RNC in August 2012.
title: Great Location
comment: This is decent hotel with amazing location. As someone who stays here for business often, I love it because I can walk to all of my meetings downtown with no problem. Also, great access to a running path that goes for miles out along the bay which is a nice perk.

title: Thishotel has great features
comment: The hotel was very nice. The room cleanliness lwft a little to be desired. Whoever had vacuumed last did not do a thorough job and there were "leftover" items from the previous guests on the carpet. A thorough cleaning would have gotten all of this.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is a serviceable choice but could be better.
title: Good but not great, an acceptable option, needs some improvements
comment: Positives: The hotel is conveniently-located in downtown Denver. The room is fairly large and decently-equipped. Free coffee provided. The bed is comfortable and was tightly-made. The cleaning staff obviously pays attention to details. When my neighbors were having numerous guests in their room until 1:00, the hotel staff came up to speak with them.

title: Great family place to stay
comment: Our vacation started in a 2 bedroom unit that was well maintained with all appliances in great working order. I really liked the idea that my teen kids had their own room which gave us privacy. The unit was away from the large pool area but just a short walk away with a view of the waterfalls. The grounds are likewise well maintained and in the evening you can enjoy a leasurely walk. A restaurant is on site which can be pretty convenient during those spotty Floridian downpours.

title: Wonderful Hotel!!!
comment: Fantastic property and staff. In particular, the General Manager (Marie) is an extremely friendly and helpful person who made my stay much more enjoyable.

title: Sports weekend
comment: We stayed at the Belvoir as we were attending both the Bronco game on Saturday and the Rockies game on Sunday. We found the staff to be friendly and helpful. The location was very convenient to all the local bars and restaurants.

title: Excellent hotel for short term stay
comment: Facilities are very clean, the club lounge served good quality food and the service was impeccable.

title: Great Hotel, Great Location
comment: Had to call twice about a toilet that didn't really flush correctly. other than that, hotel is very nice and location can't be beat. Garden Grove and Cabana Bar are very nice.

everyoneShouldKnow: Don't expect to be able to lounge by the pool, the chairs are all broken, and when they say the hotel was renovenated - not true, some areas of the hotel were not renovated and remain old, dirty, and dingy.
title: okay stay - but needs work
comment: My stay was in 8/2012. Certain areas of the hotel were noticibly dirty and dingy. The pool lounge chair straps were all broken. Could not sit on them without your butt falling thru. On the steel beams above the indoor pool there was black mold growing. You can see the black mold by the 3rd floor hallway window. Nobody told me about my BPG benefits or that you can get benefits for opting out of room service. Can't comminicate with cleaning staff, they don't speak english. The shampoo they provided was cheap-like using detergent on my hair. Would have rated them lower, but I was there for a convention, and I did enjoy the convention.

everyoneShouldKnow: Perfect location; easy to freeways, Hillcrest, Shopping and downtown
title: nicely renovated room; great location
comment: I have stayed at this property many times and the room update was definitely needed. My 10th floor room had been nicely done. Bed very comfortable, desk, club chair, etc. Bath vanity was a bit small, but that wasn't changed from the previous re-do. Two easy suggestions: There was no place to hang hand towels. They just laid on the sink. Also, how did they not add multiple plugs for re-charging phones, computers. Fortunately I brought my own power strip and unplugged a lamp. Nothing on the desk to plug into. Great breakfast for "platinum" members. Enjoyed it very much.

everyoneShouldKnow: Heather is awesome at the bar
title: Pleasantly Surprised
comment: After reading some of the reviews I almost changed hotels. To my surprise all the review were incorrect during my stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: clean hotel, nice staff, relaxing and fun pool environment. I would definitely go
title: Nice hotel
comment: was happily surprised. We had only a short time at this location and we were busy off site, but I wish I could have stayed and enjoyed the pool area which looked inviting. Staff was very accommodating regarding our room needs and was able to match online offers that we had seen.

everyoneShouldKnow: So close to Universal studios - walking distance.
title: Great location
comment: Pricey hotel, but all hotels around Universal are. Excellent location, staff and management. Overall great experience.

title: Beautiful Location
comment: This is a beautiful location, with lots of friendly staff and tourists. The atmosphere is excitedly relaxed, which makes for a wonderful stay. Whether you are on business or holiday, the hotel has an enviroment that fosters what you are looking for!

title: Great Location!
comment: First time to stay at a Belvoir in a long time. Hotel staff was helpful and friendly. The room was clean though would have loved to have been given one on a higher floor facing the river - very nice view! Regardless, bed was comforatable - love the linens!

title: Convenient location
comment: Easy access to restaurants and shopping but it would be nice to have elevator service on more than one elevator. Room doors slam loudly. Our next door neighbors went in and out of their room 26 times between 11:00 PM and around 12:30 AM one night. I know children will play but who can sleep with that kind of noise?

title: BPG Recognition Below Par
comment: Check in for Gold and Platinum members was not expedited with two at front desk while "non" preferred guest line had four front desk clerks, even though their line was shorter! None of other clerks offered to take from BPG line. Assume I didn't receive BPG preferred guest room, no bottled water, robe, other amenities received before at this hotel and other Belvoirs. Not the best experience I've had at this hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Don't eat there and be ready to carry your own luggage.
title: Needs Better Staff
comment: The restaurant staff, not including the manager, were slow, non existent and very unfriendly. Waited around for someone to appear to get seated. Then waited around for someone to take our order. We were there for a class reunion and our classmates had the same complaint. Plus there was no one to carry luggage.

title: Excellent Location
comment: A short walk to Pike Place and the wharf. Another short walk to the monorail to the Space Needle. Great for a vacation stay!

title: unfortuately disappointed
